extension.description: MultiSafePay Virtuemart to MSP order update plugin. If you use Klarna via MSP you need to update MSP with shipping information. This plugin updates order status at MSP when you set Shipped status in Virtuemart.

field.name: api_url
field.label: API url (Live or Staging)
field.description: Use https://testapi.multisafepay.com/v1/json for TEST API, see API Docs https://docs.multisafepay.com/api/

field.name: shipped_state
field.label: Shipped Order Status Code
field.description: Set Virtuemart Shipped order status code
